news_header: Georgia faces political turmoil and economic challenges linked to billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili amid protests and sanctions.
news_original_title: Georgia's richest man said to be moving funds to avoid US sanctions
news_text: Last spring, Georgia's parliament rushed tax code amendments amid protests against Russian influence. Billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili benefits from these changes, leading to international sanctions and political instability. The economy is suffering, with predictions of zero growth and calls for new elections.
